Name: Blitz Roads
About the game: Blitz Roads is a cyber-virtual game world where you can race other vehicles in an action packed racing battle in a virtual void. * Includes 30 main levels (more levels coming soon) * Play Multiple Challenges in 'Challenge Mode'. * Play a level in 6 different ways with game modes. Game Modes * Normal Race - Default styled racing * Timed Race - Racing under a time limit * Elimination Race - Finish last in a race, you're eliminated * Single-lap Race - Racing with only one go around. *No Powercubes - Race without using power-ups *Blitz Speed- Race in any area with Double the speed. Xbox Controller support * This game is combatible with a gamepad controller. * Connect a Wired USB or Wireless Bluetooth Xbox Gamepad to your pc. * Game may need a restart to take effect. Online multiplayer * Online 2- player mode is currently under development.
